modules.name: Pysgota
modules.description: Generates a range of polyphonic values based on sin() function.

modules.name: Gwreiddyn
modules.description: Convert v/oct to quantizer root input.

modules.name: Clwyd
modules.description: 16 polyphonic shiftable gates based on binary representation of a value.

modules.name: Patrwm
modules.description: Translate v/oct signals into HexSeqP2 pattern-selection cv.

modules.name: Nilyniant
modules.description: Transform note voltages to control sequence number input for various impromptu sequencers.

modules.name: Graddfa
modules.description: Convert notes into values for selecting modes of Bidoo Dikt@t.

modules.name: cyfeiriad
modules.description: takes a polyphonic gate signal and outputs if there are an even number of gates active or if there are less than two gates active. (Useful to control arpeggiators.)

modules.name: seiclo
modules.description: Polyphonic sample and hold with sequencer
